name: Crystal of the Mage
description:
You play as a Mage who must defeat bats without killing the magical Crystal.

This game was made for the GameDev Comunuity Jam. The Jam lasted for 3 days, and the theme was "You can't stop."

Credit to those who's asset I used:

+ Jonas Tyroller (Woviie Jam 2.0 Pack) - Music and SFX

+ Elthen https://www.patreon.com/elthen (https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-bat-sprites) - Bat sprite (I recolored it.)

+ Font: Minecraftory

Aside from these, I made everything.
